title: What are some ancient tattoo symbols? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are many types of different tattoo symbols such as Celtic tattoo symbols, Egyptian symbols and many more. 1.  2.  African Tattoo Symbol DUAFE is the “wooden comb” used by women to lock their hair (a quite similar version exists in Polynesian culture as well) and symbolizes femininity and beauty. 3.  4.  The Egyptian Ankh The Ankh was, for the ancient Egyptians, the symbol (the actual Hieroglyphic sign) of life but it is an enduring icon that remains with us even today as a Christian cross. It is one of the most potent symbols represented in Egyptian art, often forming a part of decorative motifs. 5.  The Latin Cross Tattoo Symbol Also known as the Latin cross. It is the most common symbol of Christianity that represents the redeeming martyrdom of Jesus when he was crucified. 6.  Buddha Eyes Tattoo Symbol 7.  Anchor TattooThe anchor tattoo has been quite a favorite of seafaring people who got it inked on themselves to proclaim their love for the deep and open waters. However, now it has become very popular with the others too, and a lot of men, as well as women, can be seen sporting it. The anchor tattoo is seen as symbolic of stability, security, safety, strength, resilience, steadfastness, fidelity, hope, and salvation. 8.  Egyptian Scarab Tattoo Symbol 9.  Scarab Tattoo Symbol 10.  Hindu Tattoo Symbol 11.  Horned God Druid Tattoo Symbol 12.  Eye of Horus Tattoo Symbol 13.  Eternal Hindu Tattoo Symbol 14.  Kintinkantan This African tattoo symbol means (puffed up extravagance) This symbol expresses arrogance 15.  Hindu Lotus Tattoo Symbol 16.  Anchor Fish Symbol 17.  Pentacle Tattoo Symbol 18.
